attributedString.string:
The Inland Northwest Nature Connection is dedicated to bringing environmental education to the Spokane area. INNC has a lot of goals - the main one being to bring a Nature Center to Spokane and provide explorative education to all ages! The INNC is determined to provide schools and the general community fun and inspiring experiences through all kinds of nature related activities. 

We at INNC believe the best way to achieve all of these goals is to have a Nature Center right here at home…and we need your help! If you believe in the power and importance of environmental protection then the INNC kindly asks for your generous donation. Whether you can give a small sum, a large sum, or simply your time and volunteerism, the INNC wants you to be involved! Your donation will go towards the creation of the nature center, and all of the amazing experiences that will come with it’s creation! Your donation will also go towards the funding for students of all incomes to join in educational and nature-filled field trips! Please see below all of our donation options, or feel free to submit your own custom donation amount. All donators will receive a rightful place on our Donation Pathway, which will pave the way towards the future entrance of the Nature Center!
